hymn.title: We're feeding on the living Bread
hymn.chords: | C - - - | C - C/E - | F - - - | D - D7/F# - | G - G7/B - | C - G7/D - | C/E F G - | Am - G7 - | C F/C C - | C - C/E - | F - - - | D - D7/F# - | G - G7/B - | C - G7/D - | C/E F G - | Am - G7 - | C F/C C - |

layout.singingstanza: We're feed -- ing on the liv -- ing Bread, We're drink -- ing at the foun -- tain -- head; And who -- so drink -- eth, Je -- sus said, Shall nev -- er, nev -- er thirst a -- gain. What! nev -- er thirst a -- gain? No, nev -- er thirst a -- gain! What! nev -- er thirst a -- gain? No, nev -- er thirst a -- gain! And who -- so drink -- eth, Je -- sus said, Shall nev -- er, nev -- er thirst a -- gain!

lyrics.stanza: We're feeding on the living Bread, We're drinking at the fountainhead; And whoso drinketh, Jesus said, Shall never, never thirst again.
What! never thirst again? No, never thirst again! What! never thirst again? No, never thirst again! And whoso drinketh, Jesus said, Shall never, never thirst again!
